channel.title: Simplicity is a form of art... - seshowtree

item.title: How does foo_t get this privilege?
item.description:
Today a question was raised how the unprivileged user domain user_t was allowed to write to cgroup_t files. There is nothing obvious about that in the roles/unprivuser.te file, so what gives?

I used a simple script (which I've been using for a while already) called seshowtree which presents â€¦
item.dc:creator: Sven Vermeulen
